title: Marie Claire Magazine font
content:
I know that the body font on the cover is Mercury but was wondering if anyone new the name of the font for the actual title words: marie claire?

thanks :)
author: kimmer259

comments.content:
It always helps us if you include an image or link. Then we don't have to try to find it ourselves.

- Mike Yanega

I think it's custom (and not very well drawn at that), but [Globe Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141124153309/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/globe/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D66%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3Dmarie%2520claire%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D17) is similar.
